languages.text: {n}Идира сгибается пополам, пытаясь заслониться руками от вашего двойника.{/n} "Оно вцепилось в него, перетирает мысли как жернов! Что это за чудовище? Не смотреть, главное не смотреть!"

{n}Idira doubles over, attempting to shield herself from your doppelganger with both arms.{/n} "It has latched onto him, grinding his thoughts like a millstone! What is this monster? Don't look, don't look!"
languages.original_text: {n}Идира сгибается пополам, пытаясь заслониться руками от вашего двойника.{/n} "Оно вцепилось в него, перетирает мысли как жернов! Что это за чудовище? Не смотреть, главное не смотреть!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira bends over in half, trying to shield herself from your doppelganger with both arms.{/n} "It's latched onto him, grinding his thoughts like a millstone! What is this monster? Don't look, don't look!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira doubles over, attempting to shield herself from your doppelganger with both arms.{/n} "It has latched onto him, grinding his thoughts like a millstone! What is this monster? Don't look, don't look!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira queda doblada, intentando protegerse de tu doble con ambos brazos.{/n} «Se ha apoderado de él, ¡pulverizando sus pensamientos como rueda de molino! ¿Qué es este monstruo? ¡No lo mire! ¡No lo mire!».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira doubles over, attempting to shield herself from your doppelganger with both arms.{/n} "It has latched onto him, grinding his thoughts like a millstone! What is this monster? Don't look, don't look!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira queda doblada, intentando protegerse de tu doble con ambos brazos.{/n} «Se ha apoderado de él, ¡pulverizando sus pensamientos como rueda de molino! ¿Qué es este monstruo? ¡No lo mire! ¡No lo mire!».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラは両腕でドッペルゲンガーから身を守ろうとして、体を折る。{/n}「この怪物は彼に取り付き、彼の思考を石臼のように削り取っているわ！この怪物は何なの？見ないで、見ちゃダメ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira doubles over, attempting to shield herself from your doppelganger with both arms.{/n} "It has latched onto him, grinding his thoughts like a millstone! What is this monster? Don't look, don't look!"

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは両腕でドッペルゲンガーから身を守ろうとして、体を折る。{/n}「この怪物は彼に取り付き、彼の思考を石臼のように削り取っているわ！この怪物は何なの？見ないで、見ちゃダメ！」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉弓下身子，用手挡住了脸，仿佛想要免受那个冒牌货的影响。{/n}“它缠住了舵手长，像磨石一样碾碎了他的意识！这到底是什么怪物啊？别看，不要看！”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira doubles over, attempting to shield herself from your doppelganger with both arms.{/n} "It has latched onto him, grinding his thoughts like a millstone! What is this monster? Don't look, don't look!"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉弓下身子，用手挡住了脸，仿佛想要免受那个冒牌货的影响。{/n}“它缠住了舵手长，像磨石一样碾碎了他的意识！这到底是什么怪物啊？别看，不要看！”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira krümmt sich, versucht sich mit beiden Armen vor {mf|deinem Doppelgänger|deiner Doppelgängerin} zu schützen.{/n} "Es hat ihn umklammert, es schleift seine Gedanken wie ein Mühlstein! Was ist das für ein Monster? Seht nicht hin, seht nicht hin!"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira doubles over, attempting to shield herself from your doppelganger with both arms.{/n} "It has latched onto him, grinding his thoughts like a millstone! What is this monster? Don't look, don't look!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira krümmt sich, versucht sich mit beiden Armen vor {mf|deinem Doppelgänger|deiner Doppelgängerin} zu schützen.{/n} "Es hat ihn umklammert, es schleift seine Gedanken wie ein Mühlstein! Was ist das für ein Monster? Seht nicht hin, seht nicht hin!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira se plie en deux et tend ses deux bras devant elle comme pour essayer de se protéger de votre sosie.{/n} « L'entité s'est attachée à lui et broie ses pensées comme une meule ! Quel est donc ce monstre ? Ne regardez pas, ne regardez pas ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira doubles over, attempting to shield herself from your doppelganger with both arms.{/n} "It has latched onto him, grinding his thoughts like a millstone! What is this monster? Don't look, don't look!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira se plie en deux et tend ses deux bras devant elle comme pour essayer de se protéger de votre sosie.{/n} « L'entité s'est attachée à lui et broie ses pensées comme une meule ! Quel est donc ce monstre ? Ne regardez pas, ne regardez pas ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira iki büklüm oluyor, kendisini iki koluyla da kopyandan korumaya çalışıyor.{/n} "Onu ele geçirmiş. Düşüncelerini değirmen taşı gibi öğütüyor! Bu canavar ne tam olarak? Bakmayın, bakmayın!"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira doubles over, attempting to shield herself from your doppelganger with both arms.{/n} "It has latched onto him, grinding his thoughts like a millstone! What is this monster? Don't look, don't look!"
